thread.title: Choice Hotels to Report Third Quarter 2015 Earnings on October 30, 2015
thread.title_full: Choice Hotels to Report Third Quarter 2015 Earnings on October 30, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Choice Hotels to Report Third Quarter 2015 Earnings on October 30, 2015
text:
Choice Hotels International, Inc.
ROCKVILLE, Md. , Oct. 2, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Choice Hotels International, Inc. (NYSE: CHH) today announced that it will report its third quarter 2015 results on Friday, October 30, 2015 , before the market opens. The company will hold a conference call to discuss its third quarter 2015 earnings on Friday, October 30, 2015 , at 10 a.m. EDT . Mr. Stephen P. Joyce , Choice Hotels' president and chief executive officer, and Mr. David White , chief financial officer, will discuss the company's performance.
The dial-in number for the teleconference is (855) 638-5678 and the access code is 52809803. International callers should dial (920) 663-6286 and enter access code 52809803. A live webcast will be available on the company's website, www.choicehotels.com , and can be accessed via the Investor Info link.
The call will be recorded and available for replay beginning at 1 p.m. EDT on Friday, October 30, 2015 , by calling (855) 859-2056 and entering access code 52809803. International callers may access the replay by dialing (404) 537-3406 and entering access code 52809803. The replay will be available through Friday, November 6, 2015 . In addition, the call will be archived and available on choicehotels.com via the Investor Info link.
About Choice Hotels
Choice Hotels International, Inc. ® (NYSE: CHH) is one of the world's largest lodging companies. With more than 6,300 hotels franchised in 35 countries and territories, we represent more than 500,000 rooms around the globe. As of June 30, 2015 , 613 hotels were in our development pipeline. Our company's Ascend Hotel Collection ® , Cambria ® hotels & suites, Comfort Inn ® , Comfort Suites ® , Sleep Inn ® , Quality ® , Clarion ® , MainStay Suites ® , Suburban Extended Stay Hotel ® , Econo Lodge ® and Rodeway Inn ® brands provide a spectrum of lodging choices to meet guests' needs. With more than 23 million members and counting, check out our Choice Privileges ® rewards program to see how you can reap the benefits of being a member of the Choice Hotels ® family. All hotels are independently owned and operated. Visit us at www.choicehotels.com for more information.
SkyTouch Technology ® is a business division of Choice Hotels that develops and markets cloud-based technology products, including inventory management, pricing and connectivity to third party channels, to hoteliers not under franchise agreements with the company.
© 2015. Choice Hotels International, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
